name: Southwest Price Drop Bot
description: Bot that watches Southwest flights for price drops.

ADMIN_NAME.description: Login user name for admin user.

PASSWORD.description: Login password, used for all accounts.

PLIVO_ID.description: If you would like to use sms text messages, enter your Plivo Auth ID.

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: If you would like to use email, enter your Mailgun API Key.

MAILGUN_DOMAIN.description: The domain to send emails from, e.g. mg.example.com

MAILGUN_EMAIL.description: Email address to send mail from with Mailgun.  Example: Mailgun Sandbox <postmaster@sandbox0abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz.mailgun.org>

MAX_PAGES.description: The maximum number of simultaneous checks. 5 seems to work well on the free Heroku dyno (512MB)
